description.english: Achieve 50 points in any single attribute
Achieve 90 points in any single attribute
Achieve 16 Leadership points in any single legion
Achieve the max Relationship with all Religious Organizations
description.schinese: 与所有宗教组织达到最高关系值
description.tchinese: 與所有宗教組織達到最高關係值

description.schinese: 招募所有辰元文化的英雄
description.tchinese: 招募所有辰元文化的英雄

description.schinese: 招募所有柯塞德文化的英雄
description.tchinese: 招募所有柯塞德文化的英雄

description.schinese: 招募所有魔裔文化的英雄
description.tchinese: 招募所有魔裔文化的英雄

description.schinese: 招募所有萨辛文化的英雄
description.tchinese: 招募所有薩辛文化的英雄

description.english: Become a Intimate relationship with any hero
description.schinese: 与任意英雄成为挚友关系
description.tchinese: 與任意英雄成為摯友關係

description.english: Complete the Luan and Burningland Main Mission
description.schinese: 完成峦郡、燃心领核心任务
description.tchinese: 完成巒郡、燃心領核心任務

description.english: Complete the Capital Region Main Mission

description.schinese: 完成博瓦克行省核心任务
description.tchinese: 完成博瓦克行省核心任務

description.schinese: 完成安苏行省核心任务
description.tchinese: 完成安蘇行省核心任務

description.english: Farewell, Deng Zhichun; Welcome, Deng Zhiqiu
description.schinese: 送走邓知春，迎来邓知秋
description.tchinese: 送走鄧知春，迎來鄧知秋

description.english: Choose the kids' table in the Mountaineer banquet
description.schinese: 在未来的山民宴会中锁定了小孩那桌
description.tchinese: 在未來的山民宴會中鎖定了小孩那桌

description.english: Fight for the date palm juice classification
description.schinese: 因争执椰枣汁的具体分类而大打出手
description.tchinese: 因爭執椰棗汁的具體分類而大打出手

description.english: Buy out all goods from Wang Jian
description.schinese: 买下汪见手中的所有奇货
description.tchinese: 買下汪見手中的所有奇貨

description.english: Buy Connie's old dance shoes at the Radiance Valley auction
description.schinese: 在璀璨谷拍卖会中买下柯妮的旧舞鞋
description.tchinese: 在璀璨谷拍賣會中買下柯妮的舊舞鞋

description.english: Your generosity granted Elena's maid a painless death
description.schinese: 因你的慷慨，伊莲娜的侍女死得没有痛苦
description.tchinese: 因你的慷慨，伊蓮娜的侍女死得沒有痛苦

description.english: Hear all the stories from Yan Wuheng
description.schinese: 听完燕无痕的所有故事
description.tchinese: 聽完燕無痕的所有故事

description.english: Defeat all mountain spirits left from the Huan Dynasty border hunts
description.schinese: 击败所有桓朝边狩之时遗漏的山精野神
description.tchinese: 擊敗所有桓朝邊狩之時遺漏的山精野神

description.schinese: 击败完全诞生的罪神塞斯
description.tchinese: 擊敗完全誕生的罪神塞斯

description.schinese: 击败所有抗拒死亡的强敌
description.tchinese: 擊敗所有抗拒死亡的強敵

description.english: The threads of fate have snapped; now destiny lies in your hands.
description.schinese: 命运的丝线已经崩解，命运只在自己的手中。
description.tchinese: 命運的絲線已經崩解，命運只在自己的手中。

description.english: Achieve max Reputation level when you own a Nation
description.schinese: 作为一国之主，达到最大声望等级
description.tchinese: 作為一國之主，達到最大聲望等級

description.english: Achieve 1,000,000 Population in at least 5 cities
